Package gameengine.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGame
    This interface defines the API for the Game class.
    ILevel
    This interface describes the API for a Level object Levels will contain sets of Actor objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    This class is intended to represent a game containing levels with actors.
    GameEngineTest  
    GameInfo  
    HighScoresKeeper  
    Level
    A Level is essentially a package of Actor objects.
